price: 61. Ainsi Allah fait-Il entrer la nuit dans le jour et fait-il entrer le jour dans la nuit. Il Entend Tout et Il est Lucide.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wa-anna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
